name: Randomized game
description:
1. Contains randomly generated levels (blocks,gems,keys,portals)
  2. Randomly generated traps
  3. Randomly generated bullets  0 - 10
  4. Randomly  generated pickaxe 3 - 10
  5. Random value to the gem you pick
  6. Shop owner may steal random amount of bullets or give you random amount of bullets when you try to "Buy" 0 - 5
  7. Boss battle at random point (If you defeat the boss it gives you 5 levels)
  8. At every 5 level shop place will appear
  9. Get the key go to the portal (level)
  10. Kill the boss go to the portal (boss battle)
  11. Random gravity change
  12. Random speed change

Game Controls:

  • S - pickaxe that breaks blocks
  • Mouse Left Button - to shoot bullets that can also break blocks
  • A - left
  • W - jump
  • D - right
